ticket.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml
ticket.original-body: Commit 3942cb406e1d5db0ac00e03153809cc8dc4cc4db generates this error when doing a simple: get 'new' in ActionController::TestCase. This was previously reported in ticket #1909 and fixed in commit 893e9eb99504705419ad6edac14d00e71cef5f12. The error seems to be in action_view/paths.rb
ticket.latest-body: Commit 3942cb406e1d5db0ac00e03153809cc8dc4cc4db generates this error when doing a simple: get 'new' in ActionController::TestCase. This was previously reported in ticket #1909 and fixed in commit 893e9eb99504705419ad6edac14d00e71cef5f12. The error seems to be in action_view/paths.rb
ticket.original-body-html: Commit 3942cb406e1d5db0ac00e03153809cc8dc4cc4db generates this error when doing a simple: get 'new' in ActionController::TestCase. This was previously reported in ticket #1909 and fixed in commit 893e9eb99504705419ad6edac14d00e71cef5f12. The error seems to be in action_view/paths.rb

version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: Could you please provide a minimalistic example (perhaps upload a small 1 controller app, that would demonstrate the isssue)? I can't reproduce the error.
version.body-html: Could you please provide a minimalistic example (perhaps upload a small 1 controller app, that would demonstrate the isssue)? I can't reproduce the error.
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: Do you get the error using Haml 1.8 and this test file? http://gist.github.com/66439
version.body-html: Do you get the error using Haml 1.8 and this test file? http://gist.github.com/66439
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body:
I can't get Haml 1.8 to work with edge Rails (the errors are completely unrelated to the issue at hand, my best guess is that 1.8 isn't Rails edge compatible at all) and since you seem to be unwilling to create the minimal app to demonstrate the problem, I've gone ahead made one for you: http://github.com/thedarkone/haml-fail
The app uses edge Rails and edge Haml.
@@@ git clone git://github.com/thedarkone/haml-fail.git cd haml-fail git submodule init git submodule update ruby -Itest ./test/functional/orders_controller_test.rb
Loaded suite ./test/functional/orders_controller_test Started . Finished in 0.198724 seconds.
1 tests, 1 assertions, 0 failures, 0 errors @@@
I gave you commit rights to it on github, so give it a try.
version.body-html:
I can't get Haml 1.8 to work with edge Rails (the errors are completely unrelated to the issue at hand, my best guess is that 1.8 isn't Rails edge compatible at all) and since you seem to be unwilling to create the minimal app to demonstrate the problem, I've gone ahead made one for you: http://github.com/thedarkone/ham...

The app uses edge Rails and edge Haml.


git clone git://github.com/thedarkone/haml-fail.git
cd haml-fail
git submodule init
git submodule update
ruby -Itest ./test/functional/orders_controller_test.rb

Loaded suite ./test/functional/orders_controller_test
Started
.
Finished in 0.198724 seconds.

1 tests, 1 assertions, 0 failures, 0 errors

I gave you commit rights to it on github, so give it a try.
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: Hrm, no intentional template api were made from 2.2 => 2.3. Haml "should" work fine.
version.body-html: Hrm, no intentional template api were made from 2.2 => 2.3. Haml "should" work fine.
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: Hello thedarkone, sorry for not creating the app. Don't take it personally, I'm still learning the ropes. So, I've downloaded the project and I get the MissingTemplate error with edge rails and edge haml. What should I do now?
version.body-html: Hello thedarkone, sorry for not creating the app. Don't take it personally, I'm still learning the ropes. So, I've downloaded the project and I get the MissingTemplate error with edge rails and edge haml. What should I do now?
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: I've just downloaded the test app and it works fine for me. nachocab what gems do you have installed?
version.body-html: I've just downloaded the test app and it works fine for me. nachocab what gems do you have installed?
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body:
These are my locally installed gems: http://gist.github.com/66785 I'm on the latest version of rails and haml. If I checkout this rails commit b1d41bdfb06cb5f606f515965316a348d9bc9b47 (feb-12th) the error goes away, and if I checkout the next one 3942cb406e1d5db0ac00e03153809cc8dc4cc4db I get this error: ruby -Itest test/functional/orders_controller_test.rb Loaded suite test/functional/orders_controller_test 1) Error: test_/GET_index(OrdersControllerTest): ActionView::MissingTemplate: Missing template orders/index.erb in view path :/Users/Nacho/Documents/NetBeansProjects/haml-fail/app/views haml (2.1.0) rails/./lib/sass/plugin/rails.rb:19:in `process' test/functional/orders_controller_test.rb:5:in `test_/GET_index'
1 tests, 0 assertions, 0 failures, 1 errors
version.body-html:
These are my locally installed gems: http://gist.github.com/66785 I'm on the latest version of rails and haml. If I checkout this rails commit b1d41bdfb06cb5f606f515965316a348d9bc9b47 (feb-12th) the error goes away, and if I checkout the next one 3942cb406e1d5db0ac00e03153809cc8dc4cc4db I get this error: ruby -Itest test/functional/orders_controller_test.rb Loaded suite test/functional/orders_controller_test 1) Error: test_/GET_index(OrdersControllerTest): ActionView::MissingTemplate: Missing template orders/index.erb in view path :/Users/Nacho/Documents/NetBeansProjects/haml-fail/app/views

haml (2.1.0) rails/./lib/sass/plugin/rails.rb:19:in `process'
test/functional/orders_controller_test.rb:5:in `test_/GET_index'

1 tests, 0 assertions, 0 failures, 1 errors
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: Spotted the problem - you're running on Windows and [this line](http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/3942cb406e1d5db0ac00e03153809cc8dc4cc4db#actionpack/lib/action_view/template.rb-P15) is removing the drive letter.
version.body-html: Spotted the problem - you're running on Windows and this line is removing the drive letter.
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body:
nachocab, I don't have a windows box around right now, could you please test out the `0001-Fix-regressions-that-have-popped-up.patch` patch that I have posted in #2012?
Andrew, thank you yet again :).
version.body-html:
nachocab, I don't have a windows box around right now, could you please test out the 0001-Fix-regressions-that-have-popped-up.patch patch that I have posted in #2012?

Andrew, thank you yet again :).
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: I applied thedarkone's `0001-Fix-regressions-that-have-popped-up.patch` patch. I suspect is resolves the issue. Please test it and let us know.
version.body-html: I applied thedarkone's 0001-Fix-regressions-that-have-popped-up.patch patch. I suspect is resolves the issue. Please test it and let us know.
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml

version.body: Confirmed, patch fixed it. Thanks thedarkone, I learned a lot looking at your code.
version.body-html: Confirmed, patch fixed it. Thanks thedarkone, I learned a lot looking at your code.
version.title: ActionView::MissingTemplate with Haml
